TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Pungudan, title = Pungudan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pungudan} }

S.FORM: alang Pungudan ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Botan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 130 buwan, 359 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 90% kyan ku 323 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 10% kyan ku 36 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 86%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, Rukay 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Pungudan hya' ga Kapanan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pongodan ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Botan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 130 bowan, 359 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 90% kyan ko 323 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 10% kyan ko 36 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 86%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, Rokay 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Pongodan hya' ga Kapanan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
